Title: The Replacement Killers
Actors: Yun-Fat Chow, Mira Sorvino, Michael Rooker, Kenneth Tsang
Plot: John Lee is the best hitman money can buy. But when John refuses to kill because of the seven year-old son of his target, John's bosses send someone after John to kill him and then take his place in the ring of hitmen. John then teams up with Meg Coburn to help him escape these "Replacement Killers."
Production: Columbia Pictures, WCG Entertainment Productions, Brillstein-Grey Entertainment
